title: Cushion Cover
inscribed:
In Ottoman Turkish (Arabic script), "Abdulhamid han bin Abdulmecid el-muzaffer daima (el-gazi)." Translated into English as "Abdulhamid han, the son of Abdulmecid the Ever-victorious (el-gazi)."

See Rich Text Inscription for original text.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view

images.caption: Cushion Cover, Reign of Sultan Abdul Hamid (1876-1909). Velvet, gold embroidery, 17 3/4 x 16in. (45.1 x 40.6cm). Brooklyn Museum, Gift of Stanley J. Love, 1991.243.6. Creative Commons-BY (Photo: Brooklyn Museum, 1991.243.6.jpg)
